review: Its pretty small, the older/senior staffs are very nice esp in Steven Spielberg Theater and the entrance and exit line. This girl SHERYL that works in Human Coaster is so RUDE and MEAN, tourist came to Universal to have fun not to see unfriendly faces, if I am the owner and see this Ill fire her, mood killer

name: user_9530
review: Loved the rides the mummy, transformers, and elmo we tried. The food is good. Clean and is not that crowded to visit.

name: user_6554
review: The rides are fun. Will consider to get the express pass next time for a better experience.

name: user_9531
review: Buying tickets online was a breeze. Although I got it from the sentosa website instead of the resorts world one. It's been awhile since i went to USS for the daytime fun as past few years have only been attending the HHN instead. So it was some awesome time spent with loved ones. We got there about noon and still managed to get on the major rides and some of the lesser known ones. So for those who wants to cover all the rides, it's best to come early from their opening hours at 11am. And if you have the budget, get the express entry for all these rides. Of all the major rides, i loved the Cylon (Battlestar Galactica), Revenge of the Mummy, Transformers and the jurassic park rapids adventure. The jurassic park one is slightly different from the one at universal hollywood. From the size of the boat to some parts of the ride itself. But it is still a thrilling one nonetheless. The cylon was such a crazy one. The adrenaline rush is mind blowing. Likewise for the mummy and transformers too. For those who are more on the timid side, they can try the treasure hunter or the accelerator. For quite the movie experience, visit the lights, camera, action to feel the wrath of a cat 4 typhoon but be careful as you may get wet. Or for quite the "ride" shrek 4d is another favourite. I didn't get to ride some of the other rides due to time constrained and also was getting tired and just wanna hang out at the beach after that. While some parts are closed for renovation/upgrades. And for those who are still afraid to experience the rides m all (although it's a waste if u do), there are several instagrammable places to take pics.

name: user_9537
review: Magnificent, grand, beautiful, like Dream World.

name: user_9538
review: We had a great day and lots of fun. Everything in the park is relatively expensive, which is probably normal. For us the main attraction was Transformers the Ride.

name: user_9539
review: play the player The tourist attraction is very big.

name: user_9543
review: The spacious play area and many experiences can be reached by train and bus. You should arrange a whole day to stay in the play area.

name: user_9549
review: All rides are similar There are many things that are closed, including Water World. Entrance fee 90,000, express 60,000 If you eat this or that inside, expect to pay 200,000 won per person. But there isn't enough fun to be had.

name: user_9550
review: Limited WiFi and opening and performance hours that can only be determined on-site Very unfriendly to foreign tourists

name: user_9551
review: One of the great place you have to visit in Singapore. All of the attraction was really amazing, although some of the game you might have to wait little bit longer but it worth the wait. This place is really great to spend time with your family and friends. Lastly, I highly recommend this place for you to visit.

name: user_9553
review: Not worth the money, very long ques.. please don't waste your time here.

name: user_9559
review: An rather disappointing experiences since several rides and shows were closed. The food is of very mediocre quality and is hugely overpriced

name: user_9561
review: A fun day trip! Plan to go on a weekday if possible, then you can skip the express pass. The rides I would prioritize are: transformers, mummy returns, human, cylone and jurrasic park rapids. Other than human and cylon there is an option of single riders where you can split up from your group and fill in spaces in the rides. The wait times for single riders are generally very low so if possible do go for single riders! In the jurassic park ride, do ensure you remove your socks and shoes before the ride.

name: user_9562
review: Buy express pass and this is must visit

name: user_9564
review: Approximately 30% of the places were under construction and suspended, and only two places were open so that food had to be served.

name: user_9569
review: Perfect place to enjoy with family. They should have open until 9 to 10 PM

name: user_9570
review: Smallest theme park in the world. Also, many games are close on the day we visit.

name: user_9571
review: A fun studio for the kids to happily peek around and have a snack, like a weekend trip bt. That's it. Nothing special.

name: user_9573
review: I loved my trip to Universal Studios Singapore. The best rides were the Battlestar Galactica roller coasters, Transformers ride and the Mummy ride. There was a wait time at these rides but those were almost noon existent in the last hour of the park being open. The only downside was that a few rides were still not open. Though even if they were in not sure if I'd be able to go on them all as the wait times at quite a few rides, even with an express pass, was long. All in all this was an experience I will not forget.

name: user_9583
review: Amazing place to spend time during the holidays! The rides are amazing and are definitely worth going on multiple times!

name: user_9585
review: All the rides are to a next level especially human Galactica, cylon, revenge of the mummy, transformers.... not to name one, but all of them are really really good. We had a lot of fun and adventure. But, There are no vegetarian restaurants in universal studios. Vegetarians has to struggle finding pure vegan or vegetarian food or adjust with salads. Please open restaurants which provide only vegan or vegetarian food.

name: user_9589
review: Must visit place in Singapore. The transaformer, mummy ride was awesome & thrilling.

name: user_9591
review: It's really cool, especially for children

name: user_9593
review: What we could do was fun but a lot of the attractions were closed and the price of tickets didn't really reflect this

name: user_9594
review: There were a lot of rides, and watching 4D and Transformers & Egypt were so extreme, but it was so hot. I went there at the end of November.

name: user_9595
review: A compact theme park - perhaps could do with another big coaster, the human version of the battle star galactica coaster wasnt great! But the theming of the park was really impressive and we were able to do all the rides by about 2pm after arriving at opening.

name: user_9598
review: Best place in Singapore for adventure and animation lovers. Good place to explore with friends. 1 star less because we bought express pass but 4 of the rides were closed and the rate was same . They should reduce the rate if few rides are not available

name: user_9601
review: Love to enjoy the time here with ma lovely husband

name: user_9603
review: Not a fan of this Universal Studios. Its a bit run down, most shows and a few of my fav attractions are closed down. The Shrek 4D ride didnt have good sound and motion effects, it was either really delayed or wasnt there at all. Im vegetarian and they barely had any available vegetarian/vegan items. I was probably able to find just 3 vegetarian meals in the whole park (one of them being pizza). They need to start being more inclusive. Overall though its alright. Some of the rides are really fun. The only reason I would consider going back is because I had fond memories of there from when I was a teen.

name: user_9606
review: Lives up to the hype. USS can be enjoyed by all ages adults and kids alike. From theaters to rides to everything else, this place was simply amazing. Loved the transformers ride and for me it was the best out of all the attractions. Wings of time was another great show, amazing what they can do using water sprays, pyrotechnics and fireworks. Went using a 2 day pass and still it was not enough to cover all the attractions. It can be very crowded and for the best of rides there could be more than hour long queueu. Make sure to stay very well hydrated and try to avoid holidays or weekends to get the best of out of here. Overall it's an unforgettable experience.

name: user_9607
review: Buy tickets online, sometimes there are discounts

name: user_9611
review: Good place to spend your weekend. Have a great Sunday in USS. Don't forget to purchase your express pass, it save a lot of time.

name: user_9612
review: Really a fun place to spend time with your family... I have been here so many times but I am still enjoying it.

name: user_9614
review: For the Transformers project, I queued for an hour and then the facility broke down and I had to go out to play other projects. The park only apologized verbally but did not compensate tourists for their sunk time cost! For the other three roller coasters, you have to rent lockers to store all your belongings before you can ride them. The price is SGD 4 per hour, which is a gangster charge! Other projects are either not fun at first glance, or they have to wait in a long line to enter and find that they are not fun at all...the food is also expensive and tastes terrible! Among the tourist attractions in Singapore, Universal Studios is the one with the lowest value for money and the worst experience; compared to famous amusement parks in other countries, it also ranks last! I am really disappointed and angry before I rate this. I hope it can be improved in the future, but I will never come again!

name: user_9615
review: If you have ever been to any universal studio in other cities, dont come to this one. It will absolutely disappoint you.

name: user_9616
review: A must visit place, great entertainment, fantastic rides. Transformers, Mummy, Jurassic park rides are very exhilarating.

name: user_9620
review: Considerably smaller than Orlandos and Hollywood, half of the park is on construction, but pricing was fair and such a fun time.

name: user_9627
review: The express ticket is a must to avoid queues that seemed to average 50 minutes per ride. We arrived soon after opening and learnt to do the furthest rides from the entrance and work back thereby avoiding most of the queues. The Transformers ride was stunning both from a thrill and technical viewpoint. Disappointing that some rides were closed for maintenance and because a number of food outlets were closed the queues were quite long, again go for the food places nearer the entrance for shorter queues.

name: user_9628
review: Very crowded on weekends. Waiting time in most rides are above 30min. Not worth if using normal ticket. Very average but expensive food options.

name: user_9629
review: Have an express ticket. Waiting time for popular attractions is about 30 minutes.

name: user_9632
review: I visited on a weekday and entered around 1pm until 5:30pm. I rode all the must-ride attractions and saw most of the things I needed to see. Rather, ride for those who did the open run. I heard they waited 30 or 50 minutes to board, but the maximum waiting time for me was about 10 minutes. It probably varies from day to day, but there was more to see than I thought and the characters came out often, so it was fun to take pictures with them.

name: user_9635
review: We went for the #usshalloween2022 The experience was horrible! First, we almost got cheated to make a topup to our ticket purchased which we believe its due to their system error for not able to select our perferred date and therefore our ticket were expired. We visited the customer service, and the lady told us she is unable to do an exchange for us and requested for topup due to ovetwyelming response, the early bird price was sold out and if we wish to continue on the same date we got to topup around 8/pax and we have 4pax. We demanded for an investigation and the lady went in to check things out. While waiting for her return, we realised that we are not the only ones having the same problem and they continue with the topup to ease the troubles upon knowing the early bird tickets were sold out. I felt that the management should look into this matter and not asking the consumer to topup blindly! Second, the Halloween night should improvise on their haunt house and not reduce the houses as well as the scare zone, and also some houses were chargable on top on the entry fee!! Such a bad encounter this year, please improve!

name: user_9637
review: Earlier visited USS eight years back and had a terrific experience but sadly had a pathetic experience this time. ( Kindly note no prior information was given to us about all the things mentioned below) 1) The Madagascar ride on the left entrance is under renovation.. 2) The Universal parade is not being held. 3) Most of the rides in the park ( especially Jurasic World) under renovation). The entire grandeur of the place has been degraded rapidly over the past eight years. Was really looking forward to visiting USS after eight years. Kindly look into it to avoid loss of customer trust. Thank You. Regards, Vaibhav Aggarwal.

name: user_9641
review: Some of the rides cause serious shortness of breath. It's pretty unsafe. I didn't even get to scream, I was too busy trying to BREATHE.

name: user_9644
review: Came for Halloween horror nights. Was drenched due to lack of shelters in the park itself. Also, the rides didn't change since 5 years ago, only the seasonal events changed but it's still too crowded for my liking for a "haunted house experience"

name: user_9647
review: Amazing place and breathtaking place for families and friends. 1 day ticket can enjoy everything inside there. Please keep in mind weekdays are more crowded.. I enjoyed Cylon, Transformers in 3D, Mummy that was fantastic.

name: user_9648
review: I went mainly for the Jurassic Park theme, too bad I only discovered later that that part is really bad (they also closed the rapids, a themed attraction dedicated to this world). The Transformers and Ancient Egyptians attraction are nice. Ticket cost 81 Singapore dollars, which is absolutely not worth this amount as it remains a very small park with too many attractions closed. It is possible to go out for lunch and re-enter the park.

name: user_9649
review: The park is really not big. If there are not many people, you can experience it all in more than 2 hours. The best project is the double-track roller coaster, one human red and one colon gray. The human is mainly about weightlessness compared to traditional roller coasters, while the cylon is mainly about speed and flips. Gray is more exciting. Secondly, Transformers 3D, Puss in Shoes, Flying Sky, Dragon Flying School, and Revenge of the Mummy are more worth playing, but the others are not much. There were minions, broo and transformers for photo taking. For shopping, its mainly Sesame Street and Minions.

name: user_9651
review: It is just an awesome place. This is my second visit. Firstly in 2012 and secondly in 2022. But just one issue the Jurassic ride and Madagascar ride was not active. So ticket price should have been less.

name: user_9653
review: I want a place to rest in the shade. I felt like there were few staff.

name: user_9654
review: Seriously ? Jurassic park closed, waterworld closed, Madagascar closed. Went into the galactic and it was written 15 mn wait. We waited 1h30 mn. Not because there was a long queue but bchasse those with express pass were constantly passing over. This is crazy!!!! At the end the locker wanted us to pay 8. The management should seriously review the express pass numbers and quotas per day and how to insert them in the queue. This is not acceptable and at the end I still paid my ticket didnt I Dont go there it has become a huge mess.

name: user_9655
review: I finally went to Halloween this year with my friends, but it rained that day... I heard that the scariest haunted house is one that jumps out of the grass. I didn't see the NPC. Maybe I was afraid that there would be a risk of slipping due to the rain. There were too many people entering the other haunted houses at the same time. Its not very scary anymore, but its a very unforgettable night. After all, the roller coaster at night is really suitable for watching the scenery But if you want to go, you must buy express, otherwise you will have to wait in line all night.

name: user_9659
review: It was amazing visit in universal studio of singapore, it took me back to my childhood days, enjoyed thrilling #rollercoasterride , #canopyflyerride, most exciting ride was #revengeofthemummy so many other rides and shows were amazing. And than in the last we went to Santosa Beach, which was quite and peaceful place with a fascinating view of late evening sky #universalstudios #singapore

name: user_9661
review: Monday and Tuesday are closed. So here on Wednesday. And still busy. Some games still have a long queue. Those who are disappointed with Transformer. Wasting time queuing but the game was delayed maybe because of maintenance, so queuing for almost 2 hours was a waste of time. Luckily it's fun.

name: user_9662
review: Not worth for money as Madagascar ride, water world show , Jurassic world rides closed down. Transformers ride was on and off due to technical Issues and waited more than 1 hour for it.

name: user_9664
review: If the waiting time is inaccurate, who is at fault? Greatly disappointed unlike last time. Came on the 16 of Nov 2022, the waiting time outside Cylon said 50 mins, so we placed our stuff in the lockers which was 130 minutes, the entire queue was 2 HOURS so we ended up having to pay for the lockers for exceeding the time. Everyone was mad. Went onto the Mummy and it said 25 MINUTES waiting time and we placed our lockers which had a 55 minutes free time, the actual queue was 60 mins so we had to pay again. Come on, nobody has their phones with them, how are we supposed to know whats the time if we dont have watches. In the past, the staffs used to take note of it and ALWAYS let us exceed if its by a little, everyone at the lockers were annoyed too. The jurassic park ride was under renovation, transformers was closed due to technical issues but the staff at the entrance was kind and nice while informing us. Truly disappointing trip

name: user_9665
review: Although small in size, it is a very enjoyable place to play. Whether there are a lot of people or not, you must buy the express ticket, and if you want to have fun, go at the opening time. For lunch, we recommend Hollywood zone's Pizza. Very tasty.

name: user_9666
review: Few rides have long wait. Good for one time visit.

name: user_9667
review: Best place to relax and bring you back in the time like your are a kid. enjoy every second you stay here.

name: user_9668
review: I did not enjoy my stay here, many attractions are not open/under maintenance. I would like to go back and try more attractions. They open @11AM, and close @6PM.

name: user_9670
review: To reach universal studio.I took the MRT and got on in vivo city station. From vivo city it is connected to Sentosa island which consists of four stations where one of them is a universal studio . Good places for family and friends . Tip - Those who plan to visit Sentosa island get down in the last beach station .

name: user_9676
review: Everything closed, nothing works, full entrance fee

name: user_9679
review: This is the first time I feel such a great place!

name: user_9680
review: There are a lot of people at Universal. Be sure to use it on the express section!

name: user_9681
review: Great tourist attraction. The lines are very long so its worth getting the fast pass so you can get more fun out of your day. Staff were very welcoming to tourists and the park offered lots of fun for the whole family. The gift shops and food were a bit pricey, but it is expected for a tourist destination like this

name: user_9682
review: It was a great experience! Cylon was pretty harsh for us though :)

name: user_9685
review: This place is great fun for everyone, big or small. Enough to spend time in such a place for a whole day.

name: user_9686
review: A very nice place to visit. A smaller copy of the one in the states. Many roller coasters there and good themes to watch and play in. It has Madagascar, dream work, Egyptian, sci-if and far away sections. The place is organized but a bit crowded. I do recommend buying the express tickets as they make you fly through queues.

name: user_9689
review: Amazing rides and a great place to keep the kids happily busy.Only drawback was lack of directions, there were no maps provided and no kiosks or proper directions for the rides. Other than that everything was good. Wait time was considerably reduced with the express pass so it's a must on the weekends.

name: user_6441
review: Amazing place long queues for rides in the weekend. Reccomend buying the queue skip ticket or you can be in queues up to 90 minutes long

name: user_9694
review: Amazing love it second time stull enjoying the rides

name: user_9695
review: Love it. Very well organized. If you have the extra money you can get express pass to have faster experience.

name: user_9697
review: The place is great but you have to wait more than an hour for every ride.

name: user_9702
review: Came here for the universal studio vibes, the sesame street show was super cute, they really brightened up the atmosphere, do not order milkshakes its too sweet...

name: user_9709
review: This is my first experience at any Universal Studios and I loved it. We lost a lot of time waiting for 2 shows that were closed without notice due to technical glitches. N I'll need to visit again now that I have a better idea on how to manage my time there.

name: user_9710
review: 1/3 of park (Madagascar) was under construction!! The most popular part of park. Rides kept stopping due to technical faults! This causes very long waiting time, even cancelled! Food was terrible! I could not finish my burgers! This park is very old! With these incidents Im concern about the safety of rides as well. To sum up, its a waste!

name: user_9712
review: This is the worst adventure park ever. There are very few attractions, queues last for an hour, and children are not allowed anywhere. Don't waste your time. You'll see the scenery of different zones and get on a couple of rides if you're lucky. Terrible experience. Not worth the money at all.

name: user_9715
review: Just pay extrac and get the express ticket (or whatever it's called) so you don't have to wait for too long. The roller coasters are great, and some of them are beginner friendly. Expect waiting time for each entry (just be smart about what time to do during the day). The transformer one is a must-go but can get motion sickness.

name: user_9716
review: Reaching Universal studios: Reach Harbour front station ( Which is in Vivo city mall) Take the sentosa monorail to Waterfront station. Tickets: Buy it at the Sentosa ticket counter on the top floor of Vivo city mall. ( There are usually discounts and not many people buy tickets here so there is less queue) Show the Coupon in the guest service which to the left of Universal globe , they will give you your entrance pass. ( If you buy tickets online, which is what 50% of the people do, you have to stand in a long queue to redeem the voucher and get an entry, same goes for buying tickets in the counter) When to go : If you are a tourist plan for this on Wednesday or Thursday. Never between Friday and Sunday. Food: The food here is pricey and not worth buying... Carry food with you , there is no checking done here. So no worries. ( But please don't litter) Water : Available everywhere, in the entrance of each attraction you have watertaps. Baggage: Two/ three rides require you to deposit even your phone and wallet in a locker which is free for upto 45 mins, which is near the ride itself. Make use of them. When you go on a weekday express pass is not needed. There are plenty of meet and greet in each part. Download Universal studios singapore app. It is very useful. DO NOT MISS VELOCIRAPTOR " BLUE" MEET AND GREET Pro tip: Take a body pain tablet before reaching Universal studios.

name: user_9718
review: Very fun place to visit! Minimum queue times on all attractions (When we visited) so we were able to ride most of them. Highly recommended!

name: user_9721
review: What's more, Transformers is really cool, right?

name: user_9723
review: Enjoyed the Transformers ride a lot, others like the Battlestar Galactica one also impressive, but up to 90 minutes waiting time. Good food at the "Malaysia Street Food Center"!

name: user_9728
review: Good place must visit .wonderful rides.

name: user_9731
review: This is in the resort world sentosa. Tickets are cheaper online. Make sure to buy the priority pass otherwise it is impossible to get into the big rides. Highly recommend the movie making scene, download the universal studio app it will show you the show times and action character meeting times. Loved the meeting of blue and she shrek. The 4D movie in the far far away and Sesame Street had less waiting time. All the other attractions took more than 1hour. Food is really expensive in the place. There are vending machines here and there

name: user_9732
review: Yesterday was A perfect even its on the weekend. Probably because of the halloween most of them going for a night horror. So less crowded in a day. Suggested for you guys purchased the tickets online on its own website. Its super easy. Print it then just heading straight away to the entrance. Then you good to go. Even though they have few rides and shows that's unavailable right now but mostly other rides still opened and still can enjoy it. Overall we are very enjoy every moment there.

name: user_9736
review: Was sceptical to visit this place. But i must say, I was totally blown away by the rides. Worth it to take the express pass if you have a few spare will save you a ton of time, effort and stress. Both the roller coasters, transformers rides and the Egyptian ride were amazing. On the negative side, there isn't anything apart from the rides I mentioned that's worth the time. Gold for family folks and children

name: user_9737
review: 3 nov me and my friends went to uss and theres this staff thats to rude towards me and my friends if im not wrong his name is adil or smtg cant remember clearly me and my friends needed just a little more time to confirm the order but he is so impatient and asked us in a rude tone " eh are you ready to order " like i get it thats theres people behind us but he doesnt have to be so rude?

name: user_9738
review: Due to private event, parking was mess. Madagascar, Julian carousel, Food court, Jurassic Park water ride all closed. Less staff, long queues, less energetic staff at rides and food vans. Hope we are back to normal soon.

name: user_9740
review: There are 3 advantages 1.Suitable for a family 2.There are free lockers near the amusement facilities (45 minutes free) 3.The staff at the playground have a good attitude There are 3 disadvantages 1.The playground is really too small 2.The play time is from 11:00 am to 6:00 pm. If you like to keep playing the amusement facilities, you will feel that the time is too short 3.The biggest problem is that the ticket is 81 . However, any rides may be temporarily suspended upon admission or at any time. And without any notice. *Really ask me. If you really don't have time to go, don't regret it. Because I'm only staying for two hours myself

name: user_9742
review: Amazing Experience.Massive crowd in the weekends.waited long time for rides.Express passes might be the best option for avoid long queue .

name: user_9746
review: It's always nice to visit USS, it's always frustrating to queue up for hours, especially when the express pass would cost more than the admission. Don't fret - eat first. The lines get lighter around two hours after opening. Take pictures with the characters and just take a round before heading to the rides.

name: user_9747
review: The entertainment area was very busy but we didn't go in because it was already afternoon and we were running out of time to get back to Batam. Maybe we'll go there another time.

name: user_9750
review: Good place for adenalin rush. Much smaller then the original one in US.

name: user_9752
review: Nice and fun place, cool not hot.

name: user_9761
review: Had a great day got on some rides saw some characters and some cool drinks (overpriced) and some food. But....... Most disappointed that the rides we were looking forward to most were closed (rapid river Indiana Jones and Jurassic Park). Lots of places including stalls were closed not very good as its not a cheap day out. On a plus sideI did get my picture with Fiona and Shrek.

name: user_9763
review: Transformers, Return of the mummy, action time @hollywood, human roller coaster is a must try. I had an amazing time. Remember to pay for express, because the waiting time for one activity is crazy.

name: user_9764
review: Many attractions were closed, so even more crowded. Lavatories in very bad conditions. Needed too long wait. Dirt in Far away 4D movie. Disappointing and expensive.

name: user_9766
review: Small park with good attractions

name: user_9767
review: Buy the express pass as it helps in skipping long queues at a lot of rides saving a ton of time. Food options are not too great. Rides are good but a lot of them are not operation and many have aged a lot too. Overall a good experience

name: user_9768
review: The park was very cool and very well designed. There were not a lot of rides, and there was a fair few that were closed for whatever reason. Highly recommend to ride the revenge of the mummy which is thrilling ride in the dark, it was my favorite. Also try the Battlestar Galactica! Recommended that you buy an express pass as some of the rides have a really long wait time. The food there was a bit expensive as well as the souvenirs, but expected as all universal studios and theme parks in general are like that. All in all it was very good but not as good as the one in Orlando or in the US in general.

name: user_9772
review: Ahh, I already know this, that's really good

name: user_9773
review: Relatively small park but offer great fun. Best attraction in Singapore located in Sentosa. Accessing to Sentosa is free.

name: user_9776
review: Around 3 rides were closed. Not too crowded on a Thursday. On Nov 3, it was open until 6pm. Their express pass also was very expensive. 80sgd 70sgd base price. Best to just come at 11am on a weekday and you won't need an express pass. Regular lines were at most 40mins waiting time. We bought tickets via klook

name: user_9777
review: many rides are closed is water park, rapids adventure, Madagascar boat ride

name: user_9778
review: Need more options for drinking water

name: user_9779
review: It was fun. But it would be nicer to be able to enjoy all of the shows and rides. I visited Oct 2022 and only half were open but I pay full price, so it was a bit disappointing, I enjoyed Universal Studio nevertheless. My most fav : Transformer 4D, Shrek, and Enchanted Airways. No need to buy ticket in advanced. If your wallet allows you, buy an express ticket, it is like a vip ticket when you have shorter queue to enter the ride or show. I visited weekday but it was crowded, i really cannot imagine how it would be to visit on weekend.

name: user_9783
review: Went recently for the HHN event and was terribly disappointed by the wait time at each haunted house. Despite USS setting a limit on tickets for sale, the amount of people around is just horrendous. An average of a 90-minute wait is absolutely ridiculous, especially for the price paid. So what happens when we finally get in the haunted houses? The USS ushers in the houses obviously (and unempathetically) urges you to "move faster" and tells you to "keep walking". This is enough to ruin the experience already. Honestly, where is the fun in it if I was there to "scare" myself and still have to rush through the experience?

name: user_9785
review: Universal Studios Singapore located at Sentosa Island is the most recommended places to visit during your trip to Singapore. Best places to visit are the following: 1- Transformers the ride. 2- Mummy Theme. 3- Hollywood Theater Theme. 4- lights camera action. 5- Jurassic Park. 6- Human. Note: * Starts at 11am to 6pm. * Its cost 77 per person. * better to have the express pass to save more time. * Download the universal studios Singapore app before you arrived to get more information.

name: user_9786
review: Super fun place and a must do once if you are in Sentosa Island. Must buy tickets in advance and go for the express pass to cut short the long queues for rides. It saves a lot of time and gives you a chance to do the 2nd round in things you enjoyed. Must do: - Transformers 4d movie - Shrek 4d movie (good for below 5 years kids) - Rollercoaster ride - Mummy rollercoaster You can avoid shopping in the universal stores... Just a simple 1 or 2 things in souvenirs if required.

name: user_9787
review: So to start, the Transform attraction, the gray rollercoaster and the mummy are really great, as is the setting of the Shrek world. The disappointment of the world of Jurassic Park, the lousy scenery, the lousy attractions... nothing is going well... big disappointment Even though it is a park for children, the attractions are very poor in atmosphere and decor. In addition, the staff is very, very poorly organized and is very slow in everything they do. It gets overflowing as soon as there are a few people... the food is cold, the waiters are not friendly at all and most of the shops are lame and uninteresting. In short, 2 stars for the effort of trying to make an amusement park... Good luck if you've been to other parks in the world, this one is bad.

name: user_9788
review: It is the only Universal studios amusement park in Southeast Asia. Located on the artificial island Sentosa. I have been to Universal Osaka Japan before, so now I go to Universal Singapore to check in

name: user_9794
review: First experience to DIE-NING with the DEAD

name: user_9799
review: Went to the Halloween Horror Night. We didnt get to experience the paid experience due to the rain (it's laser tag but they planned for it to be held outdoors-it's unfortunate but refund takes a pretty long time). Very crowded and can't see the very early show. I think they were lacking speakers. Bought the express pass for the horror houses but they didnt even scan the express passes

name: user_9800
review: Fun as usual There were a lot of people after Covid opened.

name: user_9801
review: kinda sad that Rapids Adventure is closed for now. And queue for rides are insane, it's really worth it to buy express pass in advance.

name: user_9808
review: On my recent trip to Singapore, I visited Universal Studios with my wife. The place was very crowded, with rides having a 120-minute waiting time. If you are someone who loves roller coasters and theme rides, I would suggest you buy a fast pass in advance. I found the Mummy to be the best themed ride. Overall, I did enjoy the place a lot.

name: user_9809
review: Amazing day out, definitely worth the money, the mummy ride was awesome along with battlestar galatians, I would recommend buying the queue jump also

name: user_9810
review: Paid full price but so many rides were closed! This meant longer lines on other rides.

name: user_9814
review: Currently going through some renovations, so some sections were closed off. Waterworld is closed, Madagascar too. Crowd count is still going strong, queue was 120 mins for the transformers ride and 45 mins to buy food at Goldilocks, plus an additional 30 mins to find an empty table. I'd advise to bring own food instead. Happy that some shows/meet&greet are slowly coming back. Can't wait for it to get back to how it was pre-covid. A friendly advice: Buy tickets online, it's 13 more per ticket if you buy it on-site hope this helps!

name: user_9815
review: There were many characters in this halloween, but it was too late to enter at 7pm, and it was raining so I couldn't experience all the games. I was a bit disappointed. I queued for 40 minutes and the game ended in about 6-8 minutes.

name: user_9819
review: Simply amazing the rides and thrill. Sad part when we visited water park was closed. Rest all are amazing

name: user_9820
review: In Sentosa area many attractive items are there. Mzny shows are shown

name: user_9821
review: Very fun has always 20 min queues

name: user_9822
review: Express pass is a must!!! Everything else is already fantastic.

name: user_9825
review: Worst place to visit with family. Waste of time and money.

name: user_9826
review: This is where your dreams will meet unfathomable craziness. This place precedes any introduction. Transformers ride is undoubtedly the most memorable one. Revenge of the mummy is a must ride for the ultimate tossing around of your tummy. For the ultimate thrill seekers, go for Battlestar Galactica Cyclone. Buy an 'Express pass' as it'll help to cut a minimum wait of 1 hour or more on queues on any one ride of your choice. You can use your Express pass only ONCE. There's this 'Unlimited pass' which also which gives you unlimited access without any queues to any ride. But the passes(both express and unlimited) are valid only for 2 hours from the time when the park opens. So unlimited pass is actually waste of money. Having an express pass is enough to sail you through.

name: user_9828
review: Visit after 2 years COVID19 pandemic. Having fun with family.

name: user_9830
review: A great place to everyone including senior citizens

name: user_9833
review: Last visit 22 Oct 2022 - Still a fun place to visit and enjoy the atmosphere. For now Jurassic Park Rapids Adventure ride is close for maintenance, madagascar ride is close permanently and many other shows are also closed. But still have lots of fun in the park. Best to download the app to check on the waiting time for your rides it helps alot on which ride to go next. Visited 1 yr ago - Nice place to have fun, Q for some ride is still long even covid control for the amount of guest in the park. Not all restaurants are open only 3-4 at this moment. No fire works and parades.

name: user_9836
review: Compared to other Universal studio parks this one is rather small. We were here for four hours and managed to ride almost everything even without express pass - just use single riders line to be way faster. Unfortunately a lot of rides were closed during our visit. For buying ticket dont use the machines in front of the entrance - buy online and save a lot of money! If you ask kindly, the people at guest services will offer you same price as online.

name: user_9838
review: Going there for haunted houses are fun but there's time when people walk so slow you saw all the jump scare beforehand which sucks. After finishing the houses I recommend going for the rides like cyclone and human their the best rides for first timer but the queue time can take up to 1 hr each.

name: user_9839
review: Perfect place to spend your full day of fun activities. I love the transformer most and many other attractions. It's way smaller compared to Disneyland but still consists lots of fun. Recommended for everyone above 5 yr. Btw your phone will not work properly while you're there so probably you should have backup plan should you take different route with your friends.

name: user_9840
review: Relatively disappointing. It's a relatively small park anyway. Several of these shows were closed. For what you get, it is far too expensive (80 Singapore dollars). At the few good attractions you have to wait in line for a long time.

name: user_9842
review: Excellent day out, not too busy when its a weekday. Would definitely recommend getting the express pass but the unlimited express might not be worth it unless you really want to get on the big rides a few times during peak hours. We went with the regular express and got on everything once with time to spare.

name: user_9843
review: I booked the entrance ticket in advanced (but you also can buy the ticket there via Kiosk). Price's quite similar. I went there on friday. It's a little bit crowded, so I bought the express pass. The attraction waiting time about 5-10 mins (20 mins for some attraction) Food&berverage quite expensive

name: user_9844
review: Compared to other parks (Seaworld, Buschgarden, Europapark Germany) it is very small. there are only 2 really interesting roller coasters. Prices for food was expensive like in all other parks!

name: user_9845
review: It is recommended to buy tickets online, it is cheaper than on the spot. There are queues for rides at every ride. To upgrade to USS Express, you have to buy 60 dollars/pax

name: user_9846
review: The rides and shows are awesome... Just entry tickets are required all rides inside are free but has long queues could take 1-1.5 hrs for some rides... Can skip the queue by buying express tickets. Must visit

name: user_9848
review: Must buy express pass! Dont miss mummy ride and transporter ride! Play games and win.! Great adventure park but still can be more rides and more lively!

name: user_9852
review: A must go in Singapore! One should explore sentosa and its attractions

name: user_9854
review: A few of the rides were closed for repair or renovation. Overall a good experience.

name: user_9855
review: Wonderful theme park to visit with family. Full day is not enough to enjoy every rides.

name: user_9857
review: Quality of rides was high, we loved all the attractions we went to! But the wait was 2hours and 20 minutes for Battlestar Galactica even when we went on a Wednesday :/ Youd probably need to buy the unlimited express pass for a good experience. Relatively small compared to other Universal Studios. Food options were somewhat limited. Hours was quite short considering how long the wait times can be. Also went to Horror Night on a different day and enjoyed most of the experience! But again the wait could be brutal without the express pass.

name: user_9859
review: Great fun a decent sized theme park where u can do a lot of rides and see a lot of attractions. We went on a Friday and it seemed quite busy still but waiting times for rides were mostly 10 minutes or less.

name: user_9862
review: Fun fun fun. Queues are too long though

name: user_9863
review: Amazing place, feel the Movie with your body. But i think in here just like a rollercoaster and digital projector. If you have dizzy and not feel so good, don't try in here. In here they have a restaurant, sell Indian food like a Biryani, Mandi etc. Sell Merchandise and etc.

name: user_9864
review: As of October 2022, the opening hours are 11:00-18:00. I lined up 40 minutes early. On a public holiday, I entered the park as soon as it opened and was able to ride 8 rides by 3pm. It's smaller than Japan, so it's easier to get around.

name: user_9866
review: Perhaps because there were no people yet, the waiting time was short and we had fun. When I came here before Corona, even though it was a weekday, there were so many people that people were standing in line and walking around. It was a shame that Jurassic Park wasn't running, there wasn't a parade, some stores were closed, and there was still no food to eat, but it was still nice because it had been a while.

name: user_9867
review: Superb place to visit with family. Some tips to follow Wear light clothes Carry water and easy to carry food Carry pram for small kids Reach as early as possible, even 1 day is not enough for this amazing place Check weather forecast, no rain, as it may play spoilsport Avoid weekend And if going on weekends then buy express tickets.

name: user_9869
review: It was amazing! The universal studios globe is perfect for photos and has many attractions. The only drawback is that the waiting time is a little long but it's still manageable.

name: user_9871
review: not enough time to walk.... prefer go weekday.. weekend is too crowded..

name: user_9872
review: Really fun day! It was more fun than I had expected! Loved the transformer ride and the Cyclon roller coaster.

name: user_9873
review: I had to wait an average of 30 minutes to get on. Egypt wasn't as good as I expected and Transformers was fun. There's something showing movie effects on Hollywood Street and it's quite worth seeing.

name: user_9874
review: went there during F1 period and it was crowded. However the crowd management is good, there was a short show to entertain the guest while waiting to enter USS

name: user_9876
review: amazingggg experience.. especially the mummy ride.. kept repeating this ride everytime i come here.. sam experience like 10, 6, 3 years ago haha.. went on sunday, not many people, no need to queue long time except for transformers ride.. tips: donwload the uss app, it will help to check how long you need to queue for each ride, suggesting you guys to pls start with left ride first, only then slowly move towards the most queued ride..if you start with right side, you will spend lots of time queueing, and in the end not able to enjoy the whole park..

name: user_9878
review: It is a marvellous place made with a lot of heart. The waits are excruciatingly long. Water coolers are rare here. Food is expensive. But kids would thoroughly enjoy the rides and the kingdoms created. One has to walk a lot on this visit.

name: user_9879
review: it cant be denied that this amusement park is one of the best Disneeland Ive ever been to!! The adrenaline games bring me the extremly feeling especially. I just want to advice though that if you are planning on going here, you should purchase the priority pass because you can not participated all of games there because of wait in line. But with the priority pass you can pass through easily and thats what made this experience very enjoyable. Besides, you can try the Horror night on Haloween event in Oct. It actually bring to us a great vibe and thriller astmostphere

name: user_9881
review: Not enough rides for younger kids. Probably one of the most underwhelming theme parks I've ever been to.

name: user_9884
review: Overall HHN 2022 was great but without express each queue can go up to 1 over hours.

name: user_9891
review: There are quite a lot of tourists. Waiting in line for each ride is quite long. The place is not wide, can walk around. The restaurant is quite adequate but doesn't accept cash. Various shows There is a clearly visible sign showing the show times. But you can view it through the theme park's app.

name: user_9897
review: It's starting to look a little tired and could do with some TLC. When I went quite a few rides, shows and shops were closed, but of course the ticket price remains the same. Many of the rides are pretty average for today's standards, and EXTREMELY short, especially for how long you may have to wait. I still had fun but I think it needs some improvements to keep up with parks of a similar calibre.

name: user_9901
review: I had an amazing time at Universal Studios Singapore! The rides were so much fun and I loved the themed areas. The staff were all so friendly and helpful. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone looking for a great day out.

name: user_9903
review: Kids really like it. Buy tickets in advance and get in easily. If you buy a fastpass, you don't have to wait in line for the rides at all.

name: user_9909
review: The rides are less than 3 mins, but the waiting times are horrendous. I waited 1.5 hours for a ride (3D Transformer) that lasted probably about 3-4 mins. Then while I was waiting for the Human Vs Cylone ride, it was announced the ride had closed. Also, I'm certain there was an "accident" on the line, and it had not been cleaned up properly. It smelled foul, and I even saw traces of it in the pathway. The waiting time is awful. Don't think about coming here without an express ticket. (However, even that is only limited to some of the rides.) Also, other rides and attraction sites have been closed. Universal Studios was one of biggest reason I came to the Singapore. It's been a total let down. I wouldn't recommend it. I won't be coming here again unless there's been major changes.

name: user_9910
review: Long queues in rides but worth it end of the day...only point it closes at 6 PM hence plan your rides accordingly..

name: user_9914
review: This is my return visit after 3 years, but half of the attractions are under construction and many of the attractions that are open are not operating. As a result, there are too many people, and places to play, eat, or rest are crowded with people. I bought an express ticket, but coming here now is a complete waste of money.

name: user_9917
review: Monday closed Tuesday closed Wednesday open till 6 pm till Sunday. Waterworld under renovation Jurassic water ride under renovation Madagascar under renovation Rest all rides are open If with child and infant then please buy express pass Tickets 81SD

name: user_9918
review: Queues were too long Passes including express costed too much and most of the rides were closed Majority Food outlets also not operating

name: user_9919
review: Transformers and The Mummy are the ones to try right away!

name: user_9932
review: Memorable place.. have plenty of rides and fun activities.. cant finish it in one day..

name: user_9933
review: We visited by October 2nd week. Singapore best entertainment place. Admission ticket is appox 70 and single time express pass is around 60 Bought it near from transformer shop. Express pass is really worthy. But nearly 4 rides are closed(Included photo) so you can use it again for 4 opened rides. Best rides: Transformers, cyclon, revenge mummy.

name: user_9940
review: very fun but disappointing that parts of USS are always under construction so you can never get the full experience or benefit at any given time. due to the crowd its not worth the time to queue so we got express passes which are almost daylight robbery. anyway, worth a go. buy tickets in advance as its cheaper on the website than in person.

name: user_9944
review: One of the best theme park i've ever been to! Rides are phenomenal I really loved the 3d transformers ride bring yo own water bottles

name: user_9950

But i kinda dissapointed for the night halloween session, too crowd and cant experiance the horror feel as the people are overwelming the NPC and you wont ever feel scare but the decoration and the Cosplayer still very malverous.

name: user_9953
review: Almost half of the attractions are closed and waiting time in all the good rides is more than an hour. Good place but perhaps better crowd management will make the experience better for everyone

name: user_9958

name: user_9963
review: Went for USS HHN. It was worth the time and much effort put by staff

name: user_9974
review: Transformers are so much fun. Long wait for rides, hot weather

name: user_9980
review: The rides where very fun and the food was ok the best part was the fireworks and if you are bringing a kid you should try out the Elmo or the transformer ride

name: user_9982
review: Great rides and attractions! I suggest buying universal express ticket than the regular one to avoid long lines. :)

name: user_9986
review: Buy universal express pass if u don't want to stand in queue

name: user_9987
review: I visited USS in the October, not sure if this the month they do renovations. Many rides were closed. Although we visited on a Wednesday, it was busy. It might be because of some rides and shows were closed. My favourite is Mummy ride.

name: user_9988
review: It was really amazing I enjoyed it a lot.. i can never forget it.

name: user_9992
review: Was a shame some of the rides were closed due to maintenance. But overall, was really fun.

name: user_9998
review: The park was small so it was easy to look around. Cheaper if you buy tickets in advance In some countries, there are a lot of people who cut in, kick bathroom doors, and are often rude.

name: user_9999
review: I have attended the American parks and this one its not even close to the universal studios experience Buy tickets online and page failed, charged and didnt get response on phone and email Attend the park and have to do 45mins to solve the problem have to pay again and they say will refund 1/4 of the games where closed really bad experience after knowing how real universal studios works in America

name: user_10001
review: Loved the experience My favorites are Transformers Mummy Ceylon Totally mind blown

name: user_10003
review: Too crowded and with numerous rides not operating including the water world show, a nightmare with waiting time over 90 mins in most cases. Staffing appeared inadequate and many food and drink venues were not open . Perhaps universal studios SG should cap the numbers in the park and make it more worthwhile for the people paying 74 per person. Not recommended under these current conditions

name: user_10004
review: Suitable for family and friends holidays, just 1 day here will feel satisfying

name: user_10005
review: Ticket at counter - 81 Ticket online - 68 With mastercard - 106 (for 2 tickets) Play time 11am - 6pm Monday, Tuesday Close Overall so happy to be here but before pandemic, the their operating time was way longer. Hopefully it will be like before *was there during Halloween season School Holiday Was so crowded

name: user_10006
review: If you go on a weekday, there will be less waiting, so you don't have to buy an express ticket. Extreme rides require all small belongings to be stored in lockers before riding. Galactica is the most fun and Transformers is also fun. It's good because there are a lot of rides. The park is small, so you can see everything in half a day.

name: user_10010
review: If possible please get an express pass else you will have to wait for 1-2hrs in every good rides and will not be able to complete all the rides

name: user_10012
review: It's smaller than Universal in Osaka, but it's not that big, so it's easy to see everything in one day, and it has a nice Halloween atmosphere. (Tip) If you come alone, you can board immediately as a single seater. I want to know what I want to know What's the matter? 1) 1st place 1st place 1st place

name: user_10017
review: 8 Oct 22 , enteted 11:30 am, we left 2:30pm. We bought the Express rides , so base fee Express with 1 ride each. However, to avoid queue, some rides allows Single Person lane which means you won't be with your group so you just be allocated to any random seat in the ride, the queue is very fast. There are some room for improvements: 1. The ticket counter , last lady on the utmost left ( when facing the counters) super short hair, her attitude ?? she rolled her eyes when I asked abt mask wearing, if this is optional, USS should have put a poster to indicate , mask wearing is optional. I am sure there are many people would have asked. She should however be professional to says it's optional, rather than giving me a vague answer. Then when I probed further, she rolled her eyes. 2. The Korean Corn Dog is a cheat, no sight of any protein or meat or mentioned its vegeterian snack . it's crumbed thick Korean rice cake 6 . 3. Lockers , free for first 45mins, I left bag for more than 45mins ,total 10, but I left my bag inside and didn't took my credit card with me.

name: user_10020
review: This is one of the best place in Singapore. Many rides are there. U need a whole day to enjoy all d rides. Most attractive ride is transformer, Mummy but all d rides are unique nd special at there own way.

name: user_10022
review: Have so much fun here... will came again next time

name: user_10024
review: Very good the park but its needs more kids rides. Take the vip ticket it worth it.

name: user_10026
review: Great experience and brilliantly themed and laid out. The park itself has a good variety of rides from indoor and outdoor for a variety of ages and thrill seekers. The pricing is really high though across the board be it for food, souvenirs or experiences. Wait times can be excessive with certain attractions having an average queue time of upto 90 minutes. Fast pass/ skip the queue costs almost double the regular rate. Time visits to avoid local and major international school holidays and peak travel seasons. Weekends are always a lot busier than mid week.

name: user_10030
review: Rip off, we were told inside that our infant could only go on one ride and then an additional 90 for express lane entries.

name: user_10034
review: Fantastic place And great attractions

name: user_10040
review: Long queue, long waiting time at Treasury Hunter, Dinosaur etc due to the guards were talking to each other, mood less, very slow in getting passengers in and out of the rides. Probably tired and bored doing the same routine every day.

name: user_10041
review: Been to universal a few times. But this time was probably my worst experience. Loads of rife a closed down and out of the few functioning rides, some were temporarily closed down due to technical issues. But the pricing still remains the same. Just an overpriced theme park with maybe 5 good rides.

name: user_10042
review: Greatest place for entertainment and roller coaster rides

name: user_10043
review: You should go here on a weekday, or you can go on a weekend and buy the express pass.

name: user_10044
review: Highly recommended! Do buy express entry tickets before you visit Universal Studios. Its bit expensive but you wont regret spending that extra money. It will atleast 5 hrs to complete the entire studio. Do try their Mummy Returns, Spielberg show, transformers, Roll-a-coaster rides. You can skip treasure hunt for sure since its of no use wasting time there.

name: user_10046
review: Halloween horror nights didn't live up to its expectations. The haunted houses weren't even scary. They were mediocre at best. The scare zones didn't even have ppl to scare you. Every ride had a wait time of 1 hr. Its not worth paying 78 bucks

name: user_10048
review: USS used to be my favourite place in SG but after COVID, so many rides and stalls were closed. If you want to go for Halloween Horror Nights, (I went on a thur non-peak) everything will closed before 11.30pm even if the site says 12.30am .We didnt get to utilise our food voucher because of that and only got to 1 haunted house. They should have also anticipated the late crowd going home but theres no more available transport as the last shuttle leaves by 12am. Everyone walked to Vivo

name: user_10051
review: Honestly I am SO disappointed with this park. Went in approx. at 11:40am and out at 2:30pm. Nearly every ride was closed due to the rain or maintenance. All in all this park seems a little outdated. Used one ride waited for more than two hours. Everything was absolutely overcrowded due to the small selection of what one could do. To charge full price for this disaster is completely blowing my mind. Cannot recommend it at all.

name: user_10056
review: Wonderful place to spend for a day, so wear comfortable clothes and shoes. so many attractions to play, many good spot photos. Must do : MUMMY, Transformers, Human. Go to the restaurant before lunch time to avoid peak hours. Buy tickets in advance, so you only scan the code.

name: user_10058
review: Well worth a visit. Had a lot of fun here. Express passes are definitely worth it if you can afford it. The passes are on a dynamic pricing system. So prices will increase as demand increases or as the park gets busier. There are two types of express pass. One is for unlimited rides (90) and the other is express pass for one ride each (60), ie ie you can only fast pass each ride once. A wrist band is issued for unlimited rides and a ticket is issued for "single" express pass where the rides are ticked off when used. Our group picked the single fast pass and then was told four of the fast pass rides were closed so we were able to "replace" those with other rides that we liked. We got in just after 12, left at closing and struggled to go on all the rides. Can't imagine the productivity if there was no express pass when queues are 1-2 hours long. Free lockers are provided for some of the roller-coaster which means waiting can seem longer without a phone. Overall a great day out.

name: user_10059
review: Its my first time and ima give USS a 4 star for this. Really enjoyed the rides, 5D movies and many more.

name: user_10060
review: Attractions quite good, especially the Battle Star Galactica roller coasters. Unfortunately, a few things stood out negatively: Some areas were closed. The waiting times were very long for a weekday (bad luck). The requirement to lock backpacks away before queuing for the roller coaster is more of a rip-off. The barrier boxes are free for a certain time. But we had to wait in line longer and were allowed to pay 6 to get our things back. There is also an expensive Express Pass system, which increases waiting times for "normal" visitors. It's a shame that such systems are used here. In my opinion, both Europapark and Mirabilandia are superior in many areas.

name: user_10061
review: Had a phenomenal time with my family here. The rides are great, each one giving you a rush of adrenaline. The entire place had an immersive atmosphere, that really made you feel as if you were right there in that world. The waiting lines were tedious, as even the express pass queue was long

name: user_10062
review: It was a great theme park but sadly there is one areas that are under construction that you couldn't get there. (They should discount the ticket of this happens) There's plenty rides that are great for kids and there is some extreme one.

name: user_10066
review: Overrated and overpriced! Except for one ride - Galactica, rest all are quite normal ones! Moreover when we went the entire water world was closed for renovation and multiple other rides were closed as well, yet the price remained the same! A note - without express pass, there is no way, one could complete the rides in a single day! And express pass is extremely expensive!

name: user_10069
review: Today we went ,great place but alot of rides closed or extremely long queue 2hrs for the transformer ride 4min ride, great ,then roller coaster, mummy ride faulty so queue had to exit. Horrible day at universal ,lots of rides closed and extremely long queues. Expensive food. Disappointed. COVID has certainly effected the place. Shame

name: user_10070
review: A lot of attractions closed and limited opening hours. But still same cost. Long queues even with Express pass. Hopefully better next time.

name: user_10072
review: Long wait time inside. Last minute cancellation

name: user_10074
review: Dont come here. Most of the rides, stores and attractions are closed. We waited 50 mins in the express pass line for the mummy ride. The attraction ended up malfunctioning and we got stuck for an hour.

name: user_10075
review: Amazing rides and amazing atmosphere. But waiting time for each ride is killing. Try to go there on weekdays . But most rides are amazing.

name: user_10076
review: Nice place for visiting mostly kid 10 for many ride experience. Security are not at per incident with me purchased Baby Stroller & kept to designated stroller parking place but stolen as usual by an Indian (hindi speaking). Anticipated the person but struggling to get security guard help to catch red handed. Though provided a new stroller. By felt very shame being Indian

name: user_10081
review: Great fun for the kids but for the bill payer, you see the shorten park hours, the many closed rides & shows, expensive drinks & food, 80mins queues for rides, and overall a very pricey day out. Get an express pass if you can stretch the wallet as with the shorter park hours, the long waits will eat into how many rides you get to go on.

name: user_10082
review: Need to something for long awaiting queue. Rest all good

name: user_10083
review: The most enjoyable place in Singapore consists of games, swimming pools and a casino. If you go there, take all the tickets at once on the link road that you put at the entrance because it will be the cheapest of the four places. If you go there, do not forget to ride the cable car and stop at the middle and go down to the games below.

name: user_10084
review: It was so good. It was a bit small and mainly geared towards children, but it was great for adults to play lightly as well. Everyone, please buy the express ticket without fail. It's so comfortable. You can easily buy tickets to Universal on site, so you don't have to go in if you can't buy them online. As of early October 22 Highly recommended Mummy Transformers highly recommended Battlestar Galactica is human? Cyclone was much more fun than that. I rode in the front row and the back row, and both were fun hahaha. Jurassic Park is under construction, so its a flume ride? I didn't enjoy it. Shrek is just not that good? If you use Express, it's really convenient and you can wait a little bit and have great fun.

name: user_10086
review: At the time of visit the Jurassic Park ride is still not open. Arrive there early and you can finish every single ride of the park within 45-60 minutes.

name: user_10091
review: Pros: Transformers theme ride was amazing and took us into a different dimension for a bit. Rollercoasters are fun, specially the Egyptian theme ride and the twin coasters. Good place to spend and kids would love the shows. The souvenir shops are great and you get to purchase good merchandise and chocolates. Cons: Rides are relatively few and many are usually shut down. Some of the 4d experiences are quite ordinary. If you are someone that has experienced Dubai park. This is a definite letdown. Piece of advice: If you are visiting on weekends and specifically during the first half of the day, make sure you purchase an express ticket. You will definitely not regret the extra cash spent. Lines are long and one of the rides took me 2.25hrs to get in, while the ride lasted 4mins. No water and seating throughout the duration of wait made it worse.

name: user_1084
review: Third visit! Everyone says that Universal Singapore is not big, but it is too big for me, who is physically weak, haha. I never waited in line for more than 30 minutes! The most fun thing was the twin roller coasters! Thrilling... It was around 4pm and there was almost no line for Transformers, so I got on it right away! At first, there was a lot of line for Minions, so I had to wait for 30 minutes, but when I got out, I saw that there was no line.. I guess you have to get your timing right! It was hard, so I went to Starbucks to recharge my stamina and play again! I like it because there are a lot of parades.

name: user_10093
review: Last visited about 5 years ago and it was good although waiting time was long. This time realised things not maintained properly,dirty and a lot of algae around. Food choices were lesser. Madagascar ride was no longer available. Tickets prices should be adjusted if a ride is taken down. Trick or thrills could be better,seem pathetic though with the skittles candy distribution. Staffs are no longer friendly but just being there to work with no passion. Especially those doing the crowd controls during the meet and greet could be friendly enough instead of shouting at people around to move. Price for the visit not worth at all. This place is no longer how it used to be. Giving the 2 stars just for the mascots effort.

name: user_10094
review: because I didn't have much time for vacation this time, so I didn't buy the entrance ticket and play on the rides (I really wanted to), I just walked around enjoying the shops around. lots of tourists at that time, but they respected each other so no one was fighting over a photo spot. there is a lego house too, very pleasing to the eye. To get here I almost got lost because the bus driver said there are 2 ways to get here and the closest way is to stop at the next stop, so I followed him. it turns out that the driver's intention was to take sentosa express. I was confused and finally another bus came which took me to the previous stop (at the tunnel). hahaha apparently the previous stop was the fastest way to Universal Studios. an unforgettable experience!!!

name: user_10096
review: I came here at the beginning of 2018 with my family for just a few days... I want to review my experience... for friends'' If you go to Singapore, you should also stop by here. There are lots of playgrounds. However, in my opinion, most of the rides are heart sports like roller coasters or similar, only the themes are different. So, if someone gets dizzy easily, it's best to ask the staff first and choose a ride that's light. It is also recommended to bring an umbrella or something that protects your skin from the sun because during the day it is very hot but I didn't play the rides, I just took photos and just wanted to know and enjoy the nature in Singapore because the rides are quite expensive hihihi _

name: user_10097
review: Kids would love the rides. Just that many rides are no longer available (post covid) and there are only a handful left. They make you wait for hours for every ride and that way you wouldnt notice that you arent doing as many rides as you could have on a single day.

name: user_10100
review: Most atractions are closed,

name: user_10102
review: Went with 3 kids and 3 adults. Very very expensive. The jurassic park ride wasn't working - given its about 15% of why people would come there should be a discount. They didn't put up any sign and only told you when you are buying the ticket after Q'ing up in the heat - like you're going to turn around and go home at that point. There was a lack of staff to operate the rides leading to longer Q's. They also have express passes where you can skip the Q, which clearly tells the world the rich get better treatment than the poorer people. To top it all off - thunder storms rolled in and all the rides stopped working - again - no offer to reissue a pass for another day - for example like if a concert was called off. Don't waste your time going here.

name: user_10104
review: The park is not as big as expected and everything closed by 6pm - which is mainly why it will only get 4 stars. Make sure to secure the express pass for an enjoyable experience!

name: user_10106
review: It is best to book through the website Make sure it is open before visiting.

name: user_10110
review: If you want to go universal studio then buy tickets online because there is discount on online booking. Yes its joy-full day but if you already seen Disneyland then this one is ok ok for you .

name: user_10111
review: No wait to get into the park. Great rides, definitely recommend getting fast passes - walked straight onto a ride that had a 80 min wait time. A few sections of the park was closed due to construction. Outdoor rollercoasters were temporarily closed due to rain however as soon as the rain stopped they reopened

name: user_10114
review: There are a lot of people, even on a weekday. The food is expensive.

name: user_10115
review: Should reach on time, that's the key to take maximum advantage and fun.

name: user_10118
review: The rides are nerve wrecking which i enjoyed much . The live shows were all entertaining.A place u must see & visit.

name: user_10123
review: Beautiful views, lots of games that are no less interesting and places to shop for souvenirs that are sold and interesting (Yuliana Teacher Model Catwalk)

name: user_10127
review: Loved the place. Ambience, rides, facilities... everything outstanding. Amazing experience with my toddler. Totally loved it.

name: user_10129
review: Good family fun. Do grab the express tickets if you don't wish to spend time waiting.

name: user_10130
review: So many pros & its worth a visit.. noting a few suggestions. - ask if all rides are working, generally 1 or 2 rides but not function - buy tickets online to get discounts - fill a survey before exiting to get free souvenirs. - express pass is always a worth to buy to avoid wait time. But a suggestion, try the rides always in reverse, start from the last instead of the first. - use lockers for 60mins, they are free - avoid photos at the beginning, start clicking towards the last to enjoy the rides the max possible.

name: user_10138
review: I had fun spending time with my friends took pictures around.

name: user_10145
review: Wheelchair friendly. Got priority for being on a wheelchair in every ride and there was no wait time at all

name: user_10148
review: Like me, I very much recommend purchasing Vib tickets because for regular or Express tickets, the game will require a wait of no less than 40 minutes.

name: user_10150
review: Some rides are still closed but 80% things are now open. If you have small kid you may not be able to do many rides due to height limit but otherwise it never bores. Mummy ride is my personal fav!

name: user_10151
review: Very nice and awesome place. There are many roller coaster rides that can be a test of courage and a very exciting and tense experience.

name: user_10154
review: Rides are super amazing Awesome place to spend the day with family and friends

name: user_10157
review: Some of the attractions is closed due to maintenance. Need to come again.

name: user_10160
review: It's a fun place. But when it gets crowded, you won't be able to ride the rides even before closing time. The admission tickets are too expensive for the locals. Hope Universal studios could come out with a attractive price for our locals

name: user_10161
review: One of the top attractions of Singapore. Must visit when you travel to Singapore. It's an amazing adventure park. Lots of activities, rides and shows. One of the best experience is transformers ride. It's a 4D adventure experience. Shrek 3D movie is much fun for kids. They also have meet and greet activities during the day and you can click pictures with your favourite characters. You need almost full day here. Carry your water bottle and snacks so that you can keep munching. They have 2-3 cafes, but options are limited with long ques and high prices.

name: user_10168
review: enjoyed all the rides, sadly the rapid adventure at jurassic closed when i went. will visit again soon!

name: user_10169
review: One of the best place to go to with family or even a friends! Cant wait to be back here really soon.. from Surabaya to Singapore!

name: user_10170
review: M'eh. Overpriced. Very long wait times for rides. Quite a few attractions closed so should have had reduced pricing. Won't return.

name: user_10172
review: Great experience though water world and Jurassic park are not open. It is worth the visit. The transformer is amazing.

name: user_10173
review: Universal Studios Singapore is Southeast Asias first and only Universal Studios theme park. Immerse yourself in the storytelling of Hollywood. Be transported by adrenaline-pumping rides, interactive shows and a wide variety of exciting attractions based on the blockbuster movies and television series you know and love so well. Universal Studios Singapore is a theme park located within the Resorts World Sentosa at Sentosa, Singapore. It features 28 rides, shows, and attractions in seven themed zones. It is one of the six Universal Studios theme parks around the world. Welcome in and enjoy the ride!

name: user_10175
review: Fantastic place to visit and this was my second time to universal studio's, at 81.oo per adult you would expect all attractions to be operating but this was not the case , we were done in 4.5 hours , very disappointed as we have traveled from Tasmania with 72year old mother . Maybe price should differ when attractions are closed .

name: user_10176
review: You can visit almost all of them in one day with FastPass. Although it was a weekday, there were a lot of people and I was a little tired

name: user_10178
review: Universal Studios was excellent! Loved it! I got to go on Jurassic Park ride on Wednesday 25 February 2015 & some dinosaurs spat water on my head then we plunged into darkness before hurtling down the rapids which was similar to Wild West log flume ride at Movie World on Gold Coast, Australia

name: user_10180
review: this the crowd place i've ever seen in singapore.. keep cool, because the weather is to hot outside, online payment, clean, lot of facility in there, recomended for family..

name: user_10183
review: Worth to go. In weekdays not so crowded. But still need to que for battlestar gallartic rollar coasters. The others are not much to que. Better to buy tickets online for cheaper price. There was no ticket price difference between foreigners, PR and SG when I've been there.

name: user_10185
review: could be a great place, but the express passes are a joke. dont bother wasting your money on express passes, you cant even use them on most of the rides.

name: user_10187
review: One of the must visit place in singapore, visited at a weekday to avoid long queue. Btw transformers still has a long queue since the last time i visit this place at 2012

name: user_10190
review: You are the person love thrilling experience you must to visit Universal Studios... You cannot cover it in a day but with Express pass we covered all... If you going early also they will open around 11AM only... Have to wait outside For roller coasters you can not bring anything (bag, mobile, camera) they will inform you to secure it inside the locker... There are many lockers provided but most centers are near roller coasters... Transformers Ride and Revenge of the mummy was really really incredible, don't miss those rides... Will be a whole day event if going on rides... I really enjoyed Jurassic world and far far away... I just love all the rides... Weather was extremely hot so make sure to bring water... If I'm going to Singapore, I would definitely visit again! Check out the video on youtube channel "Priya Raj" "PriyaaWorld"

name: user_10191
review: So fun. My dream come true to meet my favorite character also enjoy every attraction

name: user_10193
review: Few main rides was closed.this cause long que for other rides.. Easiest way to get there is to drive there and park at the basement..daily parking rates only 6..

name: user_10194
review: This is what dreams are made of! We were initially skeptical whether to spend this much on the entry fee, but trust me, its every penny worth it! We once again got to experience our childhood fantasies... one must visit it to understand the impact! Quite an experience!

name: user_10195
review: World class ticket price but few ride not available at the moment. Renovation on going. Kinda small studio...

name: user_10196
review: It was very, very fun-

name: user_10198
review: Many thrilling games

name: user_10202
review: Superb experience with express lane pass

name: user_10203
review: enjoyed every ride. staff are so well mannered.

name: user_10205
review: Half of the part was closed...yet still charged full price

name: user_10206
review: You will need to buy the express pass also. Also checkout the lego store.

name: user_10208
review: Evrything is perfect, the place, people, rides, foods and best of all theres a STARBUCKS coffee

name: user_10210
review: Had a worst experience visiting . All you can experience 3-4 good rides that too 1.5-2 min each . No GoPro or any such devices allowed to film while in rides . Over expensive food inside . Racist staffs . You have some better places to visit in Singapore.

name: user_10213
